name: For the Ruins of Manjaro
description:
Battle for the Ruins of Manjaro!

Controls:

- Use 'A' and 'D' to move

- Keep 'P' pressed to Shoot

- Press 'LEFT SHIFT' to Roll/Dodge (You're invincible while dodging!)

- Press 'SPACE' to Jump

- Press 'S' to come down of a platform
